actions.name: ConnectAsMaster
actions.description: Grants permission to connect as a master to the signaling channel specified by the endpoint

actions.name: ConnectAsViewer
actions.description: Grants permission to connect as a viewer to the signaling channel specified by the endpoint

actions.name: CreateSignalingChannel
actions.description: Grants permission to create a signaling channel

actions.name: CreateStream
actions.description: Grants permission to create a Kinesis video stream

actions.name: DeleteSignalingChannel
actions.description: Grants permission to delete an existing signaling channel

actions.name: DeleteStream
actions.description: Grants permission to delete an existing Kinesis video stream

actions.name: DescribeEdgeConfiguration
actions.description: Grants permission to describe the edge configuration of your Kinesis Video Stream

actions.name: DescribeImageGenerationConfiguration
actions.description: Grants permission to describe the image generation configuration of your Kinesis video stream

actions.name: DescribeMappedResourceConfiguration
actions.description: Grants permission to describe the resource mapped to the Kinesis video stream

actions.name: DescribeMediaStorageConfiguration
actions.description: Grants permission to describe the media storage configuration of a signaling channel

actions.name: DescribeNotificationConfiguration
actions.description: Grants permission to describe the notification configuration of your Kinesis video stream

actions.name: DescribeSignalingChannel
actions.description: Grants permission to describe the specified signaling channel

actions.name: DescribeStream
actions.description: Grants permission to describe the specified Kinesis video stream

actions.name: GetClip
actions.description: Grants permission to get a media clip from a video stream

actions.name: GetDASHStreamingSessionURL
actions.description: Grants permission to create a URL for MPEG-DASH video streaming

actions.name: GetDataEndpoint
actions.description: Grants permission to get an endpoint for a specified stream for either reading or writing media data to Kinesis Video Streams

actions.name: GetHLSStreamingSessionURL
actions.description: Grants permission to create a URL for HLS video streaming

actions.name: GetIceServerConfig
actions.description: Grants permission to get the ICE server configuration

actions.name: GetImages
actions.description: Grants permission to get generated images from your Kinesis video stream

actions.name: GetMedia
actions.description: Grants permission to return media content of a Kinesis video stream

actions.name: GetMediaForFragmentList
actions.description: Grants permission to read and return media data only from persisted storage

actions.name: GetSignalingChannelEndpoint
actions.description: Grants permission to get endpoints for a specified combination of protocol and role for a signaling channel

actions.name: JoinStorageSession
actions.description: Grants permission to join a storage session for a channel

actions.name: ListFragments
actions.description: Grants permission to list the fragments from archival storage based on the pagination token or selector type with range specified

actions.name: ListSignalingChannels
actions.description: Grants permission to list your signaling channels

actions.name: ListStreams
actions.description: Grants permission to list your Kinesis video streams

actions.name: ListTagsForResource
actions.description: Grants permission to fetch the tags associated with your resource

actions.name: ListTagsForStream
actions.description: Grants permission to fetch the tags associated with Kinesis video stream

actions.name: PutMedia
actions.description: Grants permission to send media data to a Kinesis video stream

actions.name: SendAlexaOfferToMaster
actions.description: Grants permission to send the Alexa SDP offer to the master

actions.name: StartEdgeConfigurationUpdate
actions.description: Grants permission to start edge configuration update of your Kinesis Video Stream

actions.name: TagResource
actions.description: Grants permission to attach set of tags to your resource

actions.name: TagStream
actions.description: Grants permission to attach set of tags to your Kinesis video streams

actions.name: UntagResource
actions.description: Grants permission to remove one or more tags from your resource

actions.name: UntagStream
actions.description: Grants permission to remove one or more tags from your Kinesis video streams

actions.name: UpdateDataRetention
actions.description: Grants permission to update the data retention period of your Kinesis video stream

actions.name: UpdateImageGenerationConfiguration
actions.description: Grants permission to update the image generation configuration of your Kinesis video stream

actions.name: UpdateMediaStorageConfiguration
actions.description: Grants permission to create or update an mapping between a signaling channel and stream

actions.name: UpdateNotificationConfiguration
actions.description: Grants permission to update the notification configuration of your Kinesis video stream

actions.name: UpdateSignalingChannel
actions.description: Grants permission to update an existing signaling channel

actions.name: UpdateStream
actions.description: Grants permission to update an existing Kinesis video stream
